title: New PM at Gangarama Temple
body_lines: Newly appointed Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe engaged in religious observances at the Gangarama Temple, Hunupitiya after the swearing in yesterday. UNP Deputy Leader Ruwan Wijewardene, General Secretary Palitha Range Bandara and UNP  Chairman Vajira Abeywardene were also present at the occasion. Pix by Pradeep Dilrukshana
